title: Government MPs should be committed to fulfill public aspirations, says President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Chandana Perera) “The public has placed utmost trust and confidence on ‘Mahinda Chinthanaya- Idiri Dekma’ and re-elected me as the President of this country with a huge majority and given almost 2/3 power in the parliament at the last General election. Therefore the UPFA parliamentarians should be…
